sn24.8:1.4: na vipariṇamanti → na viparinamanti (bj); na vipariṇāmenti (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
sn24.8:1.9: na sopi kañci → na koci kañci (bj, sya-all, km); na koci taṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
sn24.8:1.11: pavuṭā → pavudhā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); pamuṭā (bj); sapuṭā (mr) | mahākappino → mahākappuno (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
